comments.body: Can you please update the constructor documentation to describe that `tristate` can not be null, and that `value` can be null if `tristate` is true?
Done. BTW the prohibition of null value for `isTreeLine`, `selected`, `controlAffinity` and `autofocus` parameters is also missing. But I think this PR is not the right place to fix that.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +270,274 @@    this.autofocus = false,
    this.contentPadding,
    this.tristate = false,
  }) : assert(tristate != null),
       assert(tristate || value != null),
